mapper.select: SELECT vt.video_id, vt.title, vt.description, vt.create_time, vt.tags, vt.image_path, vt.release_time, vtd.views, LEAST((COALESCE(vtd.likes, 0) / 1000) * 5, 5) AS make FROM vt_video AS vt JOIN vt_video_data AS vtd ON vt.video_id = vtd.video_id where vt.video_id = #{videoId};

SELECT v.video_id, v.title, v.image_path, vu.week_day, vu.update_id v FROM vt_video AS v LEFT JOIN vt_video_update AS vu ON v.video_id = vu.video_id WHERE 1=1
AND vu.week_day = #{video.weekDay}
AND v.title LIKE concat('%', #{video.title}, '%')
ORDER BY vu.update_time DESC
SELECT vv.video_id, vv.title, vv.create_time, vv.image_path, vvd.views, vvd.likes FROM vt_video vv JOIN vt_video_data vvd ON vv.video_id = vvd.video_id ORDER BY vvd.views DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT vv.video_id, vv.title, vv.create_time, vv.image_path, vvd.views, vvd.likes FROM vt_video vv JOIN vt_video_data vvd ON vv.video_id = vvd.video_id ORDER BY vvd.views DESC, vvd.likes DESC, vv.create_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT v.video_id, v.title, v.description, v.image_path, v.tags, v.type, VVC.category_id FROM vt_video v LEFT JOIN vt_video_data vd ON v.video_id = vd.video_id LEFT JOIN vt_video_category vvc on v.video_id = vvc.video_id WHERE vd.user_id = #{userId} and v.video_id = #{videoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vt_video_data (video_id, user_id, views, likes) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{userId}, #{views}, #{likes});
